title.narrative: Low Emissions Climate Resilience Development in the Pacific

description.narrative: The Assigment will deliver a multi-country programme of work focused on supporting Pacific Islands Countries (PICs) to develop the policy, legislation, regulations, strategies, roadmaps and investment pipelines planning necessary to support their transition to low-emissions climate resilient economies and societies.

The Assigment will deliver a multi-country programme of work focused on supporting Pacific Islands Countries (PICs) to develop the policy, legislation, regulations, strategies, roadmaps and investment pipelines planning necessary to support their transition to low-emissions climate resilient economies and societies.

participating-org.narrative: New Zealad Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade (MFAT)

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04523 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: Based on an approved scope a LECRD program document is developed that is be evidence-based, drawing on all available sources of information including research and evaluation findings to help design for best results.

description.narrative: Acceptance on the draft project concepts by GoT/ DoE, Monthly/ Quarterly/ Annual progress reports

title.narrative: 1 LECRD project document

Kiribati has developed LECRD strategies and plans inclusively and has put in place supporting policies, legislation and regulations in place to guide public and private sector investment in LECR development

Prepare a Project Concept Document to guide the preparation of a more detailed LECRD program document. This concept document will identify priority initiatives and priority countries for implementation of the program. It will also present a proposed methodology for delivery of the program

description.narrative: Concept document is review and approved by donor.

title.narrative: 1 Project Concept document
A Low Emissions Climate Resilient Development (LECRD) program is developed for the Pacific region

description.narrative: LECRD program document is approved. LECRD program moves into implementation phase

title.narrative: 1 LECRD program document
Prepare a Stakeholder Engagement Plan. The Stakeholder Engagement Plan should detail the relevant stakeholders for developing a program document.
